title: Benchmarking Music Autotagging with MGPHot Expert Annotations vs. Generic Tag Datasets
summary: This paper introduces a new benchmarking dataset based on the MGPHot dataset, which includes expert musicological annotations, for evaluating music autotagging, comparing it against generic tag datasets.
usefulness_reason: The paper explicitly mentions a "new benchmarking dataset" with "expert musicological annotations," which can be considered a form of contextual dataset due to the rich, expert-provided information.
